effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.8 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 865,696.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

spells.description:
Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 25,151 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 75,453 Nature Damage instead.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 710,431 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
The Fist of Ra-den

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
